title: Sent emails not stored in "SENT" folder
creator: raymondrancourt
content:
Hi, I am using Thunderbird on my Android phone and PC. When I send emails from my Android phone, the emails are sent but a copy is not stored in the "SENT" folder of my phone. This feature used to work in the past, but now it doesn't anymore.

How can I resolve this? Thank you.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/142.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;solver_id:7231982

title: Thunderbird app on Android locked into authentication loop
creator: megamile
content: Thunderbird app on Android suddenly stopped moving emails; instead just repopulated inbox. Uninstalled and reinstalled app; added email account and proper password. TB locked into "Checking incoming server settings" loop. Comcast properly set up; accessible from browser. Tried entering settings manually; same result. Cleared cache and data; same result.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/updating-thunderbird"]

title: Coloring emails label colors
creator: mariusz.stanek93
content: Hello, is there an option available in settings to synchronise emails with label colour as it is set in Thunderbird settings on PC?
